definition: Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
archaic variant of 汝[ru3]
female/woman/daughter
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The Sagittarius' attitude to love drives Virgo out of his/her mind.
sentences.chinese: 射手座對於愛情的態度會讓處女座發瘋。

sentences.english: Leo will respect Virgo's clever and alert mentality.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座能尊重處女座的機智及警惕。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the Virgo man needs to keep his critical nature in check.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，處女座男人需要抑制他的挑剔特性。

sentences.english: The adage 'opposites attract', holds true when you think of Virgo and Pisces compatibility.
sentences.chinese: “異性相吸”很好的形容了處女座和雙魚座間的關係。

sentences.english: Nervousness or exuberant outbursts of emotion are not usually associated with Virgos.
sentences.chinese: 神經質或者是激情澎湃很難與處女座掛上鉤。

sentences.english: Pisces teaches the Virgo how to relax and enjoy the little pleasures in life.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座也教會處女座怎麼放鬆和適當的享受生活。

sentences.english: The cold and detached nature of theVirgo can make his Pisces woman feel insecure.
sentences.chinese: 處女座男人的冷漠本性讓雙魚座女人感覺到不安全。

sentences.english: Stay-at-home Virgo resents Libra's socialbutterfly instincts and pursuit of pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 愛宅的處女座憎惡天秤座天性愛拈花惹草，追求快樂。

sentences.english: Virgo wears a neatly-pressed suit and tells everyone they're a bookkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 處女座穿着熨帖的套裝，逢人便說自己是簿記員。

sentences.english: Virgo personalities have a mind which bears a strong and firm character.
sentences.chinese: 處女座性格中有着堅強和剛毅的個性。

sentences.english: First, let's talk about the likes and dislikes of Virgos.
sentences.chinese: 首先，來看一下處女座的喜好和厭惡。

sentences.english: Virgo likes to attack back when confronted.
sentences.chinese: 處女座受到攻擊時，喜歡反擊。

sentences.english: Virgos are very choosy about their lover.
sentences.chinese: 處女座對愛人十分挑剔。

sentences.english: Virgo wears a neatly-pressed suit and tells everyone they're a bookkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 處女座穿着熨貼的套裝，逢人便說自己是簿記員。

sentences.english: These nit-pickers sometimes compromise their own pleasure for the sake of perfection.
sentences.chinese: 挑剔的處女座有時爲了尋求完美會犧牲自己的快樂。
